ygData.messageBody:
This train aspect is a possible use of the spell. Theoretically, there may
be good situations to purposefully use this as a fetching tool when you know
the area. ...but I agree it is certainly useless as a scouting tool.

-----Original Message-----

From: Cristie <cristie@...>

Also the other thing to take into consideration when
purchasing/using this
spell is that if you send the eye out to look around you
have to be
prepared for monsters to train to you. I have not
personally experienced
that happening (because I use it very rarely if at all), but
I have heard
of others who have used it in the dungeons only to pull a
bunch of nasties
out on themselves, and everyone else, in the process. It is
kind of a
novelty spell, if you ask me, with no real use at this
point. If they made
the eye an entity that monsters would not train on it would
be worthwhile,
otherwise I would just wait. Had I known I wouldn't have
purchased it myself.
